products.title: Konya Blackout Butter Cream
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout butter cream roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackout butter cream plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.
